posts.post_content: Registration critical -- many of these to my eye have a slightly fuzzy look.  Thanks for looking.

Here's one albeit at a fairly inflated price. 
[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/T206-T-206-Nap-Lajoie-With-Bat-PSA-5-HOF-RARE-Tolstoi_W0QQitemZ150400519572QQcmdZViewItemQQptZUS_Baseball?hash=item230491cd94[/url]

Peter,

Speaking from experience, I think that would be a fine card for you to pursue. Best of luck in negotiating a price that's only twice what the card typically sells for, as opposed to the nearly 3x the seller is seeking.
Yeah I saw that one but couldn't quite pull the trigger LOL.
to be fair rob has bought up most of the available lajoies out there so when you see that lajoie at 2X-3X it's just simple supply/demand at work.
Though I can overpay with the best of them, I take no credit for contributing to the asking price of $2,500 for a card that typically sells for just less than $1,000.
